about_the_game:
Overview: "Anti-Extinction" is more than a game—it's a handcrafted experience from Furr-Tec Studios, a beacon of innovation and creativity. Set in a vast, post-apocalyptic world, the game invites you to explore the remnants of a fallen civilization teeming with secrets and possibilities. Inspired by titles like Horizon Zero Dawn, Destiny 2, and Fallout 4, yet pushing beyond established norms, "Anti-Extinction" offers deep character development and meaningful interactions that truly shape your journey. We believe in creating games with soul and heart, delivering an emotionally resonant narrative that reflects themes of resilience, discovery, and cooperation.

Key Features:

  • Passionate Craftsmanship: Experience a game crafted with love, care, and attention to detail. Our commitment to quality over quantity ensures a rich, immersive world that feels alive and authentic.

  • Innovative Gameplay: Engage with groundbreaking mechanics and technologies. Utilizing Unity’s HDRP and our custom Aether Chaos Renderer (A.C.R.), we deliver stunning visuals and lifelike environments that push the boundaries of what's possible.

  • Community-Powered Development: Become a vital part of our passionate community. Inspired by the dedicated approach of Satisfactory's development team, we actively listen to your feedback and ideas. Your voice directly influences the evolution of the game, and our team is deeply committed to engaging with you at every step. We regularly update and improve the game based on community input, fostering a collaborative environment where creativity thrives, and players feel genuinely connected.

  • Rich Lore and Narrative: Dive into an engaging story filled with deep lore. Explore themes of survival, hope, and renewal as you encounter diverse factions, ancient technologies, and resource struggles that test your resolve.

  • Expansive Open World: Explore a stunning, procedurally generated environment with handcrafted regions. Dynamic events and environmental storytelling bring the world to life, inspired by the vastness and depth of Star Citizen.

  • Dynamic Combat System: Utilize a range of customizable weapons and agile combat mechanics inspired by Horizon Forbidden West and Assassin’s Creed. Strategic, cooperative gameplay rewards skill and teamwork.

  • Deep Character Development: Meet a cast of diverse characters, each with unique survival strategies, beliefs, and aspirations. Form alliances and relationships that influence the game's outcome and your own growth as the protagonist.

  • Meaningful Player Choices: Make impactful decisions through dialogues that reflect the harsh yet hopeful realities of a post-apocalyptic world. Inspired by Fallout 4, your choices have lasting consequences that shape the narrative.

  • Exploration and Discovery: Uncover secrets and deep lore in detailed regions. Participate in cooperative missions and challenges that balance intense combat with thoughtful exploration.

  • Innovative Weaponry and Combat Scenarios: Experience unique weapon designs inspired by Destiny 2, with customizable combat styles and strategies that enhance cooperative dynamics.

  • Pioneering Security Features: Be among the first to experience Passkey technology, eliminating the need for passwords and emails. Enjoy enhanced security and seamless access to Furr-Tec services, with options to link emails for updates and promotions.

  • Unity Innovations: Experience one of the first games built on Unity 6, utilizing groundbreaking technologies like Unity DOTS, DOTS Physics, and Havok Physics for unparalleled performance and scalability.

  • Enhanced Security with PHISE: Introducing PHISE (Protocol for Hashing Integrity, Security, and Endpoint protection), our custom-built security architecture that integrates enterprise-level features without intrusive anti-cheat measures. PHISE employs multi-layer encryption and advanced protection to safeguard the game's integrity and enhance player trust.

  • Against Corporate Greed: At Furr-Tec, we stand against corporate greed and the compromise of artistic vision for profit. We are committed to delivering games that prioritize player experience over monetization schemes, ensuring that our content is crafted with passion, not driven by investor pockets.

Disclaimer: PHISE is an innovative technology developed to enhance your gaming security and experience. It's designed to leverage the capabilities of .NET 8, which Unity is actively working to integrate. Based on recent updates from the Unity development team, the transition to .NET 8 is progressing smoothly, and we anticipate that Unity will support .NET 8 in the near future. We are committed to implementing PHISE's full features as soon as Unity's .NET 8 support is officially released. Please note that some PHISE features may not be available during the demo or at launch but will be integrated through updates as Unity finalizes its .NET 8 integration.

Our Vision at Furr-Tec:
We are not just another game studio—we are a community of innovators and dreamers dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in game development. Our passion for quality, excellence, and creativity drives us to craft games that are not only visually stunning but also emotionally resonant.

Quality Over Quantity: We believe that every game should be a masterpiece, crafted with love and attention to detail. In an era where quantity often trumps quality, we focus on creating experiences that have a soul and a story to tell.

Innovation at the Core: Breaking away from the norm, we constantly research and develop cutting-edge technologies that revolutionize gaming. From advanced 3D graphics to immersive audio design and optimized code, we're redefining the standards of excellence.

Community Engagement: Your voice matters. Inspired by the passionate and engaged community of Satisfactory, we are deeply committed to fostering a close-knit relationship with our players. We actively encourage your input and ideas, making you an integral part of our development journey. Together, we create worlds that reflect our shared passions and aspirations, ensuring the game evolves in ways that resonate with our community.

Against Corporate Greed: We stand firmly against the corporate practices that prioritize profits over people. At Furr-Tec, we will never compromise our values or artistic vision for the sake of profit. Our commitment is to you—the players—and to delivering authentic, heartfelt experiences.
